name: General Consultation
description: A routine medical check-up with a healthcare provider to assess your general health and address any concerns.

name: Dental Cleaning
description: Professional teeth cleaning to remove plaque and tartar build-up, promoting oral health and preventing dental issues.

name: Blood Test
description: A lab test to assess various health markers, such as cholesterol, glucose levels, and organ function.

name: Physical Therapy Session
description: A session with a licensed physical therapist to help recover from injuries, improve mobility, and relieve pain.

name: Vaccination
description: Immunization shots to protect against various diseases, such as flu, hepatitis, and tetanus.

name: Mental Health Counseling
description: Therapeutic sessions with a licensed mental health professional to address anxiety, depression, and other emotional challenges.

name: X-Ray
description: Medical imaging using X-rays to view bones and soft tissues for diagnosing fractures or other health conditions.

name: MRI Scan
description: A magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scan to produce detailed images of the body's internal structures, often used for brain or joint issues.

name: ECG (Electrocardiogram)
description: A test that records the electrical activity of the heart to detect irregularities and heart conditions.

name: Ultrasound
description: An imaging procedure that uses high-frequency sound waves to produce images of the inside of the body, commonly used in pregnancy or to examine organs.

name: Eye Exam
description: A thorough check-up of the eyes to assess vision and detect any signs of eye disease or abnormalities.

name: Hearing Test
description: A diagnostic test to assess hearing ability and detect any hearing loss or ear-related issues.

name: Chiropractic Adjustment
description: Manual manipulation of the spine to correct misalignments and alleviate back pain or discomfort.

name: Dermatology Consultation
description: Consultation with a dermatologist to evaluate skin conditions, rashes, or cosmetic skin concerns.

name: Podiatry Consultation
description: A consultation with a podiatrist for foot and ankle conditions, including pain, injuries, or structural issues.

name: Prenatal Care
description: Comprehensive care for pregnant individuals, including regular check-ups, ultrasounds, and screenings to monitor the health of both mother and baby.

name: Lipid Profile Test
description: A blood test to measure cholesterol and triglyceride levels to assess the risk of heart disease.

name: Allergy Testing
description: A test to identify allergic reactions to specific substances, including food, environmental factors, or insect stings.

name: Cancer Screening
description: A screening test for early detection of various cancers such as breast, colon, or prostate cancer.

name: Full checkUp
description: An overnight diagnostic test to monitor sleep patterns and detect sleep disorders such as sleep apnea.

name: Admin Consultant
description: An Admin Consultant provides expert guidance and support to healthcare organizations in streamlining administrative processes.
